name: TextField
description: An enhanced customizable TextField with validation support

props.name: color
props.description: Input color

props.name: label
props.description: Field label

props.name: labelColor
props.description: Field label color. Either a string or color by state map ({default, focus, error, disabled, readonly})

props.name: labelStyle
props.description: Custom style for the field label

props.name: labelProps
props.description: Pass extra props to the label Text element

props.name: hint
props.description: A hint text to display when focusing the field

props.name: helperText
props.description: Text to display under the input

props.name: placeholder
props.description: The placeholder for the field

props.name: placeholderTextColor
props.description: Placeholder text color

props.name: floatingPlaceholder
props.description: Pass to add floating placeholder support

props.name: floatingPlaceholderColor
props.description: The floating placeholder color

props.name: floatingPlaceholderStyle
props.description: Custom style for the floating placeholder

props.name: floatOnFocus
props.description: Should placeholder float on focus or when start typing

props.name: leadingAccessory
props.description: Pass to render a leading element

props.name: trailingAccessory
props.description: Pass to render a trailing element

props.name: enableErrors
props.description: Should support showing validation error message

props.name: validate
props.description: A single or multiple validator. Can be a string (required, email) or custom function.

props.name: validationMessage
props.description: The validation message to display when field is invalid (depends on validate)

props.name: validationIcon
props.description: Icon left to the validation message

props.name: validationMessagePosition
props.description: The position of the validation message (top/bottom)

props.name: validationMessageStyle
props.description: Custom style for the validation message

props.name: retainValidationSpace
props.description: Keep the validation space even if there is no validation message

props.name: validateOnStart
props.description: Should validate when the TextField mounts

props.name: validateOnChange
props.description: Should validate when the TextField value changes

props.name: validateOnBlur
props.description: Should validate when losing focus of TextField

props.name: onChangeValidity
props.description: Callback for when field validity has changed

props.name: onValidationFailed
props.description: Callback for when field validated and failed

props.name: fieldStyle
props.description: Internal style for the field container to style the field underline, outline and fill color

props.name: containerProps
props.description: Container props of the whole component

props.name: containerStyle
props.description: Container style of the whole component

props.name: preset
props.description: Predefined preset to use for styling the field

props.name: showCharCounter
props.description: Should show a character counter (works only with maxLength)

props.name: charCounterStyle
props.description: Pass custom style to character counter text

props.name: formatter
props.description: Custom formatter for the input value (used only when input if not focused)

props.name: centered
props.description: Whether to center the TextField - container and label

props.name: useGestureHandlerInput
props.description: Use react-native-gesture-handler instead of react-native for the base TextInput

props.name: readonly
props.description: A UI preset for read only state

props.name: recorderTag
props.description: Recorder Tag

props.name: showMandatoryIndication
props.description: Whether to show a mandatory field indication

snippet: validationMessage={['Field is required', 'Email is invalid', 'Password is too short']$6}
